languages.text: "Проктор, вы неплохо держите себя в руках. Не ожидал, что ксенос в свите Вольного Торговца вас совсем не будет смущать".

traits.locale_text: "Проктор, вы неплохо держите себя в руках. Не ожидал, что ксенос в свите Вольного Торговца вас совсем не будет смущать".

languages.text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."
languages.original_text: "Проктор, вы неплохо держите себя в руках. Не ожидал, что ксенос в свите Вольного Торговца вас совсем не будет смущать".

traits.locale_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would be of such little discomfort to you."
"You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would be of such little discomfort to you."
"You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

"You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."
"You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

languages.text: 「見事な対応ぶりですね、代理人殿。ローグトレーダーの従者に異種族がいることで、あなたがここまで動じないとは思いませんでした」
languages.original_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

traits.locale_text: 「見事な対応ぶりですね、代理人殿。ローグトレーダーの従者に異種族がいることで、あなたがここまで動じないとは思いませんでした」

languages.text: "Ihr schlagt Euch wacker, Proktor. Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass es Euch so wenig Unbehagen bereitet, einen Xenos im Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu wissen."
languages.original_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr schlagt Euch wacker, Proktor. Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass es Euch so wenig Unbehagen bereitet, einen Xenos im Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu wissen."

languages.text: « Vous m'étonnez, proctor. Je m'attendais à ce que la présence d'une xénos dans l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} vous décontenance davantage. »
languages.original_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'étonnez, proctor. Je m'attendais à ce que la présence d'une xénos dans l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} vous décontenance davantage. »

languages.text: «Lo lleva bastante bien, Procurador. No esperaba que tener una xenos en el séquito {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente le afectase tan poco».
languages.original_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

traits.locale_text: «Lo lleva bastante bien, Procurador. No esperaba que tener una xenos en el séquito {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente le afectase tan poco».

languages.text: “你的克制能力非常出色，监察官。我没想到，异形加入了行商浪人的队伍，而你似乎对此无动于衷。”
languages.original_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

traits.locale_text: “你的克制能力非常出色，监察官。我没想到，异形加入了行商浪人的队伍，而你似乎对此无动于衷。”

languages.text: "Kendine iyi hâkim oluyorsun Üsteğmen. Hür Tacir'in maiyetinde zeno olmasına göz yummanı beklemezdim."
languages.original_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."

traits.locale_text: "Kendine iyi hâkim oluyorsun Üsteğmen. Hür Tacir maiyetinde zeno olmasına göz yummanı beklemezdim."

languages.original_text: "You are handling yourself pretty well, Proctor. I did not expect that having a xenos in the Rogue Trader's retinue would discomfit you so little."
